column2: "Hey, partner! Have you seen that weirdo who's been hanging around in the Gate Area recently?"
"Huh? There's lots of weirdos around here already, so that doesn't narrow it down enough?"
"Um, I think his name was Pietro. He's the founder of the new class, Summoner."
"I've been wondering what kind of guy he is. He seems kind of hard to talk to..."
"Could you go and find out about him for me, partner? I'm sure he'll talk to you."
